summary: This is an email chain from November 2019, where an individual contacts the FBI and US Attorney's Office regarding alleged corruption by Manhattan DA Cyrus Vance. The sender claims to have evidence of Vance covering up two major crimes: a million-dollar embezzlement and child abuse by a priest (Fr. Miqueli) as a favor to Cardinal Dolan, and a Rikers Island bribe scheme involving inmate Gigi Jordan, her lawyer Alan Dershowitz, and corrections union head Norman Seabrook. The sender describes being arrested and maliciously prosecuted after threatening to expose this information.

persons.name: Cyrus Vance
persons.context: Accused of corruptly covering up two major criminal matters: the protection of Fr. Miqueli for Cardinal Dolan and the Rikers bribe scheme involving Gigi Jordan and Norman Seabrook.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Identified as the lead lawyer for Gigi Jordan and alleged to have been personally involved in the Rikers bribe scheme by bribing corrections officers for illegal favors.

persons.name: Gigi Jordan
persons.context: A millionaire inmate at Rikers Island (2010-2015) who allegedly ran a $20k/month bribe scheme involving corrections officers and union head Norman Seabrook.

persons.name: Norman Seabrook
persons.context: Head of the corrections officers' union, alleged to be on the receiving end of the bribe scheme run by Gigi Jordan at Rikers Island.

persons.name: Fr. Miqueli
persons.context: A priest accused of embezzling a million dollars and child sex abuse, allegedly protected from prosecution by Cyrus Vance as a favor to Cardinal Dolan.

persons.name: Cardinal Dolan
persons.context: Alleged to have colluded with Cyrus Vance to cover up the crimes of Fr. Miqueli and to have retaliated against the email sender.

persons.name: Gordon
persons.context: A Manhattan ADA whom the sender emailed on May 19, 2015, about planned media exposure of DA corruption, after which the sender was arrested.

persons.name: Bagdanos
persons.context: Gigi Jordan's prosecutor who allegedly admitted to the sender that the Manhattan DA's office knew about the Rikers bribe scheme all along.

persons.name: Mark Peters
persons.context: Former DOI Commissioner who allegedly ordered investigations into the reported corruption 'squashed'.

persons.name: Armond Durasanti
persons.context: Vance's Trial Bureau Chief whom the sender contacted about the Gigi Jordan bribe coverup.

persons.name: Judge Dawson
persons.context: The judge who dismissed the criminal case against the sender after receiving evidence of Manhattan DA corruption.

persons.name: Judge Heller
persons.context: The judge who sentenced Norman Seabrook and allowed him to remain out on bail pending appeal.

persons.name: Ron Kuby
persons.context: An attorney on Gigi Jordan's legal team, pictured with Alan Dershowitz at her trial.

connections.description: Alleged collusion where Vance covered up crimes by Fr. Miqueli as a favor to Dolan.
Dershowitz was the lead defense attorney for Gigi Jordan.
Alleged bribe scheme where Jordan paid Seabrook $20k/month for special favors at Rikers.
Alleged involvement in the bribe scheme, with Dershowitz's team bribing corrections officers who reported to Seabrook.
Alleged coverup by Vance of the Gigi Jordan bribe scheme to protect Seabrook.
Alleged coverup by Dolan of Miqueli's embezzlement and child abuse crimes.

events.title: Epstein Sex Offender Hearing
events.description: Cyrus Vance ordered his Sex Crimes unit chief to appear in court to implore the judge to downgrade Jeffrey Epstein to a Level 1 sex offender.

events.title: Sender's Arrest After Email to ADA
events.description: Twelve hours after the sender emailed ADA Gordon about plans to expose Manhattan DA corruption to the NY Post, NYPD arrested the sender at their home.

events.title: Gigi Jordan Rikers Bribe Scheme
events.description: Alleged ongoing bribe scheme at Rikers Island where inmate Gigi Jordan paid $20k/month for special favors, with Norman Seabrook as the recipient.

events.title: Norman Seabrook Sentencing
events.description: Norman Seabrook was sentenced but allowed to remain out on bail pending appeal, with the condition of no additional criminal actions.

keyFacts: The sender alleges Manhattan DA Cyrus Vance corruptly covered up two major crimes: a priest's embezzlement/child abuse (favoring Cardinal Dolan) and a Rikers Island bribe scheme involving Gigi Jordan and Norman Seabrook.
The sender claims to have been arrested and maliciously prosecuted for 2.5 years after threatening to expose this corruption to the media in May 2015.
Alan Dershowitz, Gigi Jordan's lawyer, is alleged to have been personally involved in the Rikers bribe scheme by bribing corrections officers for illegal attorney visits and contraband.
The sender suggests evidence against Dershowitz in this separate matter could give prosecutors leverage to 'flip' him for information on Jeffrey Epstein's accomplices.
The document references a 2011 hearing where Cyrus Vance's office intervened to seek a lower sex offender classification for Jeffrey Epstein.
